articles.title: England, Scotland and Wales exempt some countries from travel quarantine — but Canada isn't one of them - CBC.ca
articles.description: The governments of the United Kingdom, Scotland and Wales announced today that travellers to the three countries who have been vaccinated against COVID-19 in the European Union or United States will be exempt from mandatory quarantine upon arrival — but fully…

articles.title: Lack of quarantine at England’s borders ‘risks havoc of Covid variants’ - The Guardian
